content: worries if you forget to do this you can just weave this tail in at the end cut working yarn leaving at least a 12 30 cm tail thread yarn onto darning needle and close the top of the pouch by grafting the stitches together this technique creates a smooth tubular bind off edge to match the cast on edge www shanalines com/tutorials when all stitches have been joined tuck tail yarn into the closed fabric and enjoy your new fidget toy see photos on p 2 shana s cohen shanalines@gmail com march 2024 v1 1 personal use only #marblefidgetsquare #shanalines_designs 1 marble fidget square photos here are a few photos showing the process when you have reached your desired place 1 marble into the pouch created graft stitches together to close the height slip every other stitch onto spare before closing the pouch take a pouch this technique creates a smooth needle revealing the open pocket moment to thread tapestry needle tubular bind off edge to match the cast created by the double knit fabric through starting yarn tail and pull it to on edge weave in the tail yarn tucking the inside of the fabric the tail into the fabric and enjoy your finished object thanks for knitting my pattern tag me in your photos on instagram with #marblefidgetsquare and #shanalines_designs find out more about me at www shanalines com where you can sign up for my newsletter to get discount codes on future pattern releases shana s cohen shanalines@gmail com march 2024 v1 1 personal use only #marblefidgetsquare #shanalines_designs 2
